text: [Music]
today I'd like to introduce you to the
smart cycle smart cycle is basically our
way of building out a platform that
tries to combat two problems with
cycling one is safety we're trying to
make cycling safer for riders the second
part is treating the bicycle as a data
collection platform using sensors to
begin with the safety side of it we've
actually built a custom object detection
model that recognizes certain types of
road hazards so if you're approaching a
busy intersection we're gonna identify
things like stop signs or stoplights
potholes dogs any type of hazard that
you might see where your recycling along
we've actually taken that object
detection model and deployed it to a
deep line so deep lenses and Amazon Web
Services device contains the GPU a video
camera every time we detect a hazard
we're actually providing two forms of
alerts back to you as the cyclist the
first one is an audio alert so if we see
that there's a stoplight ahead we're
going to message you and say stoplight
ahead in addition to that we also have
visual cues we're actually providing
what is known as a bounding box or
drawing a rectangle around the objects
that we consider hazards now the second
part of the smart cycle bicycle
application is data collection there's a
little antenna that also captures that
ant radio information we interpret the
data on the deep lens using that Python
script and then we send it back to the
cloud we also present that data directly
to the cyclist we provide them different
types of metrics beat via visual display
so things like your speed the
temperature your heart rate you can wear
actual wireless sensor those are the
types of information that we can track
using the sensors on the smart cycle we
also can send that data up to the cloud
we're taking the data sending it over an
IOT topic landing it in dynamo DB
database and reporting on it using quick
site visualization reports so that you
can go back and look at how you
performed over time so thank you very
much that is that
pretty much all of it for Smart's like
